data.quote: I don't care that they stole my idea, I care that they don't have any of their own.
data.author: Nicola Tesla

data.quote: Make every detail perfect and limit the number of details to perfect.
data.author: Jack Dorsey

data.quote: It doesn't matter how many times you fail. You only have to be right once and then everyone can tell you that you are an overnight success.
data.author: Mark Cuban

data.quote: The best brains of the nation may be found on the last benches of the classroom.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: One way to understand human progress is to look at how technology has made products and services - once reserved for the elite - progressively more accessible and affordabl.e
data.author: Dan Schulman

data.quote: However difficult life may seem there is always something you can do and succeed at.
data.author: Stephen Hawking
